mapper.select: select count(*) from chat_room where product_num = #{product_num} and (seller = #{seller} and buyer = #{buyer})
mapper.insert: insert into chat_room (room_id, product_num, buyer, seller) values (#{room_id}, #{product_num}, #{buyer}, #{seller})
mapper.select: select p.product_title from chat_room cr join product p on cr.product_num = p.product_num where cr.product_num = p.product_num and cr.room_id = #{cr.room_id}
mapper.insert: insert into chat_message (chat_id, room_id, seller_id, buyer_id, chat_content) values(#{chat_id}, #{room_id}, #{seller_id}, #{buyer_id}, #{chat_content})
mapper.select: select * from chat_message where chat_id in (select max(chat_id) from chat_room cr, chat_message cm where cr.room_id = cm.room_id and cm.room_id in ( select distinct room_id from chat_message where (seller_id = #{id} or buyer_id = #{id})) group by cr.room_id) order by chat_date desc
